title: Kakidha Kappal Lyrics Madras Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Kakidha Kappal
Singer(s): Â Gana Bala
Movie: Madras (2014)
Music: Santhosh Narayanan
Lyrics: Gaana Bala

Kakidha Kappal
kadalula kavundhuduchaan
kadhalil thoththuttu
kannaththula kaiyya vachittaan!!

Odura paamba pudikkura vayasulathaan
yerunaa odayura murungakkaa maraththulathaan
kaiyikkuthaan ettithaan oh oh ..
vaayikkuthaan ettala oh oh ..

Kakidha Kappal
kadalula kavundhuduchaan
kadhalil thoththuttu
kannaththula kaiyya vachittaan!!

Vaththipatit azhavula
kattam onnu kattiththaaney
vazhum namma vazhkkayila

Ye inbam varum thunbam varum
kadhal varum gaanam varum
eppozhudhum kavalayilla

Kaalaththaana vaari vittu
mela naanga yeramaattom
kodikkuthaan aasa pattu.

Ye kaasu kaiyil vandhuttaalum
kastathula vazhndhuttaalum
pogamaattam manna vittu.

Thadaya thaandi nee nadaya podudaa
dakka nechanaan nee thani keluda

Kakidha Kappalil
karapoi serndhidalaam.
Kadhalil oru naal neeyumthan jaichidalaam.
ohhh .o hh..

Akkaraikku ikkarai
eppozhudhum pachchathaan oh oooh
oh oo oh
